column1: Adventist Community Services is meeting unprecedented demand for food this Thanksgiving in the pandemic and needs our help. Donate to feed our neighbors at https://t.co/76ITjKX1Sf or by mailing a check to 501 Sligo Ave Silver Spring MD 20910!

The Election isn’t over in Georgia! Facebook and Google should immediately allow ads for the Georgia runoff elections for the U.S. Senate. (The ban on post-Election propaganda ads to undermine fair counts and democracy is separate.) https://t.co/o2Xu5T8Ohk

On this glorious beautiful day of democracy revitalized I want to salute the people young and old and in-between who defended freedom and decency against all comers. Generations to come will recognize our “volunteers” as heroes of resistance and renewal.

.@ReElectHank —Your brilliant leadership in Congress and in Georgia is so impressive and what you all have done on the ground there is amazing.  Generations to come will thank you. https://t.co/4SOnvkN1dv

I was so moved about Georgia I woke up and sent this humble musical tribute to my beloved @LucyMcBath @ReElectHank @SanfordBishop @NikemaWilliams the great and amazing @StaceyAbrams @Ossoff @ReverendWarnock and all the people of #Georgia! https://t.co/9guuAjAiez
Could we be getting news of the fall of Trump and his boss on the exact same day?! No tyrant can last forever. https://t.co/aIijMnOsYy
https://t.co/hv1akWqg9C
Attention #Voters!! Standing in line when the polls close? STAY IN LINE! You will still be permitted to #vote!
Exciting to see so many wonderful friends and colleagues at Blair Wheaton Library RM and Whitman! Vote before 8 PM for 100% turnout! https://t.co/qTKTUQVAfb
Today is the day! It is officially #ElectionDay! If you haven’t voted yet head to the polls now. Find your polling place by visiting https://t.co/wASYnhv1zC.

Sending gratitude and love to @Alyssa_Milano Heroine of the Resistance and Democratic Superstar for your surpassing and relentless activism. Generations to come will thank you for your devotion to our people. https://t.co/DZk7nl0YxH
Tomorrow is election day! Your usual location may be closed so be sure to double check your voting location at https://t.co/5wS20E0d4J tonight. In the morning grab your mask and go #VOTE!
Join me and @grassrootsdemhq tomorrow at 4 PM for a down to the wire Get Out The Vote Big Blue Barnstorm phonebank to swing states!  All for one and one for all. https://t.co/O8qF3XTmXb
Did you know? Your usual #ElectionDay precinct may be closed due to the pandemic. Text EV and your ZIP to 77788 to get the three nearest voting centers to your ZIP. #Maryland #MD08

Please go vote today or tomorrow if you haven’t voted yet. No lines at all for early voting! It’s a beautiful day to redeem American democracy. Find your closest voting site here: https://t.co/GYYpl3tYLv

Happy Halloween! What’s sweeter than chocolate? Knowing you got your vote in before election day! Text EV and your ZIP to 77788 to find voting centers near you and then make your way to the polls. https://t.co/oYmBESxDZH
Don’t boo. Vote! #Halloween might look a little different this year but voting is still as important as ever. Head to your closest voting center for #EarlyVoting today! https://t.co/ykK97w53Vp
Amazing political modeling coming from Blair High School students and their teacher David Stein. Deep political insight great demographic analysis and excellent statistics. https://t.co/dXOjivVDYQ

PSA: If you requested a mail-in ballot vote that ballot. If you already have requested a mail-in ballot but change your mind it may cause voting in person to take 45 mins to 1 hr longer. Save time––mail your ballot in today or go to a dropbox.
I stand with labor and Manna along with @mcdcc on the four MoCo ballot questions this year. Let’s secure public services and strong democracy for the county’s future. https://t.co/7ekcy167y3

As @mddems Chair Yvette Lewis says “your vote is your voice!” We spent the morning at voting sites around MD— the lines are moving quickly so head over to your nearest Early Voting site and make your voice heard! Text EV and your zip to 777-88 find the site closest to you. https://t.co/ZR8ykZQaWG
Don’t be like Aaron Burr. Why wait when you can #Vote  NOW with early voting? Text EV and your ZIP to 777-88 to get a text with the three nearest voting centers. https://t.co/TkQECUB1zH
Everything you need to know about voting is just a text away. Text the codes in the image below to 777-88 and make your voice heard. https://t.co/E0ZvDH6qnN

.@ElissaSlotkin explains why getting out the vote is just half the battle in 2020. We need to protect the vote and the integrity of the election in the 78 days between November 3 and January 20. Nov 3 is halftime. https://t.co/L7tI8RNH0Q
Hey #CarrollCounty! Just a reminder to drop off your ballot at one of the many ballot boxes around the county. Find the closest one to you here:   https://t.co/MolGMgCrYp
Hey #MontgomeryCounty! Just a reminder to drop off your ballot at one of the many ballot boxes around the county. Find the closest one to you here:   https://t.co/w83JIdCrx2
Hey #FrederickCounty! Just a reminder to drop off your ballot at one of the many ballot boxes around the county. Find the closest one to you here:   https://t.co/IcpXqXKgX7
Have you dropped off your ballot yet? There are secure drop boxes located all over Montgomery Frederick and Carroll county. Drop yours off today! https://t.co/CQtTwBqKxU

We know you’re busy and ⏰ is scarce. Here are 5 things you can do in 10 minutes or less:   ● Have a snack 🥨 ● Water your plants 🪴 ● Scroll through twitter 📱 ● Meditate 🧘‍♀️ ● Mail in or drop off your ballot ✉️📪🗳️

If you’re passionate about helping make sure we have a Big Blue Wave on November 3rd but not sure where to start we can help! We have great volunteer opportunities. Just visit https://t.co/d1KzKCiWii and sign up today!

Voting doesn’t have to be confusing. Find answers to all your #election questions here: 🔽🔽🔽   Montgomery: https://t.co/kiVOY5zGn6   Frederick: https://t.co/9OWIHwzz2Q   Carroll: https://t.co/MolGMgCrYp

Is that your mail-in ballot sitting on the kitchen counter? Your vote is valuable-don’t let it get wet or lost. Complete your ballot and take it to the nearest drop-off box today. It’s a safe secure and easy way to vote. Find your nearest ballot box here: https://t.co/gZY5b97iFv

Good news! We’ve raised $1 million+ for Dems to defeat right-wing Republicans. Meantime I definitely support my friend Kate Stewart for Mayor in Takoma Park and look forward to people coming together when it’s all over. We have a nation to rebuild!

MARYLAND RESIDENTS: Are you registered to vote yet? TODAY is your last chance to register online! Don't let this election pass by without making sure your voice is heard. Visit https://t.co/JjMqUS4Fbr to get more information about registering. https://t.co/yACUa7MKXK
Join us! https://t.co/mdpb0p9PNm https://t.co/yWENi1icxr
The Maryland voter registration deadline is coming up next week on October 13th! Registering to vote is easy and only takes a few minutes. Text VOTE to 777-88 for instructions! #MD08

Our new Biden/Harris/Raskin yard signs are here! Show your support for the entire federal Democratic ticket by requesting one at: https://t.co/vOZYYitQnJ. We'll get it out to you right away. https://t.co/zueXDzCFnE

Many Marylanders across the 8th District started receiving their ballots by mail Monday. If you got yours fill it out sign the oath on the back of the envelope and return it to a dropbox or mailbox IMMEDIATELY! Track your ballot here: https://t.co/I9p6WbyE0g https://t.co/OnXx1w7KHa

Keep an 👁️ on your mailbox! Once you've received your mail-in ballot sending it back is easy. No postage printer or mask required. Save time by mailing in your ballot today! Still need to request a ballot? Text VBM to 777-88. #Maryland https://t.co/zY09FGAkkB
It's #NationalVoterRegistrationDay! Celebrate with us by reminding your friends and family to register to vote and signing up for tonight’s phone bank to North Carolina: https://t.co/tuTkl4NJHj.

Was delighted to join a vigil-rally in Old Town Takoma Park and a vigil-rally at the Supreme Court last night to honor Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg and demand that the “people decide” in the election who will take her seat. https://t.co/jNzTx13dPH
I’m very excited to team up with Senator Warren to fight for Ranked Choice Voting all across America! Go Question 2 in MA and let’s pass RCV in Congress! https://t.co/bOVz1QgFX8

Tonight I had the honor of being endorsed by my distinguished 2018 GOP opponent John Walsh who says "At this juncture in our history I believe only the Democratic Party offers a vision of hope equality and unity ...to move us forward together." Watch:  https://t.co/l5mvkvRCtv

Like Melli and Lucy all the true champions of the rights of working people observed Labor Day today in their own way. Next year (fingers crossed) we’ll reassemble at the Labor Day Parade in Kensington! https://t.co/nWebaYnRNZ

Calling Democrats who love our Republic and Republicans who love our democracy! Join me Tuesday 9/8 at 6:00 PM along with my 2018 GOP opponent John Walsh former Rep. Connie Morella (R-MD) and former Rep. Mickey Edwards (R-OK) for some news you cannot miss! https://t.co/6ExIVkO7Oh
Get your request in TODAY so your vote by mail ballot can be sent as early as possible by the State Board of Elections! https://t.co/tAuXVi1KDM https://t.co/GLv8PcPJWD

No platform. No policy. No mention of 180000 dead on their watch. No plans for tens of millions thrown out of work. They prostitute the White House and tell America to give this incompetent despot four more years. The Banana Republicans want to make us a Banana Republic.

For 80 years Maryland has  had a dismally racist pro-Confederate State Song which calls Lincoln a “tyrant.”  Ready for a new State Song? My co-creator Steve Jones and I have written one. London Mevaa’s performance is amazing. Check it out. https://t.co/YKW1gqU6jQ

For 80 years Maryland has  had a dismally racist pro-Confederate State Song which calls Lincoln a “tyrant.”  Ready for a new State Song? My co-creator Steve Jones and I have written one. London Mevaa’s performance is amazing. Check it out. https://t.co/AgTU83nQKO https://t.co/7VGPhsr0Ve

I rallied with dozens of fired-up Leisure World Dems to tell Postmaster General DeJoy: The postal service belongs to the people—not Trump or the GOP—and we need it for billions of shipments of medications consumer purchases and ballots too! Don’t mess with USPS! https://t.co/obXXNnZs0Z
Happening today at 2 PM! https://t.co/FAdnOvtPTX

I’m requesting #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor and tagging 8 people who I know will do the same @SenatorZucker @BrianJFeldman @SenatorSusanLee @SenRonYoung @CherylKagan @jwaldstreicher @Willcsmithjr @Senatornjk https://t.co/PeJKt5fzxI

What a great day for America and the Democratic Party. Joe Biden has completed our ticket with U.S. Senator Kamala Harris a powerful voice for civil rights strong democracy and social justice. Go Biden-Harris! Let's revive democracy in America. https://t.co/2nIDgW9N8B
https://t.co/TiPLvByl6T

While Trump stifles science and distorts religious teachings for his benefit religious Progressives and Secularists like @JaredHuffman @GiniGerbasi and @rabbisaperstein  are working together to defend reason & morality in our democracy. So honored to have Mary Kay Henry a great union leader and defender of working people join the Democracy Summer Fellows today. Tune in everyone! https://t.co/kFu5fBXxFd

Unions have been a lifeline for millions through the pandemic and a key force for public health and safety. Join me live TODAY at 3 PM ET as we discuss the past present and future of union organizing with @MaryKayHenry and renowned union lawyer Michael Anderson! https://t.co/9VrN9mleAe

Can the Unions Still Make Us Strong? @SEIU President @MaryKayHenry & union lawyer Michael Anderson will join us to discuss the history of the union movement and how it can help us build a more vibrant future. Tune in live on 7/31 at 3 PM ET to be a part of the conversation! https://t.co/184iKKiME7
https://t.co/84Wzf1RK7K

From Roy Cohn & Richard Nixon to Roger Stone & Donald Trump the Modern American Right has long been steeped in power paranoia and propaganda. Join us  Friday at 4 as we discuss its old–and new–tactics of scapegoating division & conquest with @seanwilentz & Sidney Blumenthal! https://t.co/Bki6pVPDxb
https://t.co/wU0oAFvpNc

Only 24 hrs until our next Democracy Summer Seminar with  @KarenBassTweets @angelajdavis  & @LawProfButler. Join us live for “I Can’t Breathe: Seeking a New Social Contract in the Movements to End Racist Police Violence Rampant Gun Violence & the New Jim Crow." https://t.co/qVSotVKUv1

We're back for a third Democracy Summer Seminar: “I Can’t Breathe: Seeking a New Social Contract in the Movements to End Racist Police Violence Rampant Gun Violence and the New Jim Crow." Join us LIVE on Friday July 10 at 3:00pm ET on Twitter Facebook and YouTube. https://t.co/uhCvWl4O3p

Our second Democracy Summer Seminar features  @RevDrBarber and Bob Moses speaking on: “Time for a Third Reconstruction? The Struggle for Freedom and Democracy in American History.” Join us live today at 4 PM by RSVPing here: https://t.co/1iled5dKAH https://t.co/81wwekZgA0

Our second Democracy Summer Seminar features @RevDrBarber and Bob Moses speaking on: “Time for a Third Reconstruction? The Struggle for Freedom and Democracy in American History.” Join us live on YouTube this Thursday July 2 here: https://t.co/st6LE4HytF https://t.co/Y7yQkAj5BP

We‘re kicking off our Democracy Summer Seminar Series for the first time to all of America. Join us live for the first event in this weekly series entitled:  “From Poll Taxes to Pandemic Voting Lines: Four Centuries in the Fight to Vote”  Tune in now: https://t.co/dfW4IxbBRi

So excited to receive the endorsement of @Brady_PAC in the 2020 campaign!  Mitch McConnell has been killing all our gun safety legislation but America will win the change in this election. Thank you Brady PAC! https://t.co/70EQYaanUA

Million thanks to all Democrats in Maryland’s 8th District for selecting me to be your nominee in November for the most crucial election of our lifetimes. I am filled with gratitude and affection for my constituents for voting in this hard time. Onward!
https://t.co/ibpQ6holbW
LAST DAY to get your ballot in a mailbox to make sure it gets postmarked by tomorrow and counted in the Maryland primary! Our democracy depends on it! https://t.co/acgi4mYz3e

It is down to the wire with TWO more days to cast your ballot in the Maryland primary––the only question left is who is going to take your picture while you vote to send to the campaign? BOTH of you: vote today and make sure all your neighbors do the same! https://t.co/JHrrmfExnm

There are THREE days left to vote in the Maryland primary election and THREE counties in Maryland’s 8th with THREE options to return your ballot and get it counted: in a state drop box in your mailbox or at a post office! Text BOX to 77788 to find the one closest to you! https://t.co/Dp0G3b6hbt

This means so much to me my SEIU 500 friends! I honor your remarkable activism and leadership and I treasure your friendship. Thanks for helping keep our people safe and our democracy alive. https://t.co/jLvTJZnNYl

FOUR days until the deadline for Marylanders to vote for a president to represent them for the next FOUR years. Make your voice heard and cast your ballot IMMEDIATELY! Send this graphic to FOUR other people to make sure they vote too! Reply with pictures of you voting! https://t.co/fEtu2tcWP4

There are FIVE days left to make your voice heard in this primary election with critical federal and local offices on the ballot. Get your ballot in NOW! Plus send pictures of you voting to info@jamieraskin.com for a chance to be featured in my countdown to Election Day! https://t.co/OuBZlkauMc
RSVP to join my 8th District Get-Out-The-Vote-Rally-from-Home this Saturday May 16 right here: https://t.co/8yx331CRbY https://t.co/aYeid7bFRl

Excited to see @nytdavidbrooks feature my friend @AlanKhazei's idea to expand national service jobs in this oped. Alan is our nation's proven visionary leader on national service and is calling for 500000 Service Year jobs to address #COVID19. https://t.co/TF86CqX5wX

I am very excited to be helping Joe Biden organize the political and moral landslide that will put an end to America’s protracted national nightmare with the corruption and incompetence of Donald Trump. https://t.co/gpBLS1SU02

I’m very proud of these two awesome Democracy Summer alumni for taking strong action to help seniors in Montgomery County. Thank you Dhruv and Matthew and all the other Blair students participating! https://t.co/ZXe0UhwFaU

My constituent and friend Dorothea Mordan in Frederick County has penned this wonderful essay about one Marylander’s journey back to suffrage rights. Now is the time to get all eligible Marylanders registered for the 2020 elections. https://t.co/lD03iaAPuK
Thank you for visiting my campaign Twitter page. If your intention was to visit my official House of Representatives Twitter page please visit @RepRaskin

I’m very happy to receive the endorsement of the MD/DC AFL-CIO’s members all across MD-8! It’s my honor to work shoulder-to-shoulder with the house of labor to defend collective bargaining equal rights for all and strong democracy. Solidarity! https://t.co/7T1A2xwl4g

Exuberant mass energy at the Do The Most Good Vision 2020 rally at Robert Frost MS! Authoritarianism is a virus but organizing and education will stop it—we are the democratic antibodies! https://t.co/nZ9zqi8ylJ

I will always be proud to have been a strong Elizabeth Warren supporter in the 2020 primaries.  She’s a brilliant and unafraid defender of populist politics and popular economics. Keep dreaming big and fighting hard @ewarren! https://t.co/EhtvtWClkV
We brought big caravans from MD-8 to Alexandria and Arlington today to “dream big and fight hard” for Elizabeth Warren.  The Chesapeake region loves Warren! https://t.co/vfO3t3aq9r

Nothing like a massive and uplifting Indivisible meeting bright and early on Saturday at the Gaithersburg Library to remind you that the people have the power. Let’s use it in 2020 and take back America. https://t.co/6TMBa3vfo5

Sign up to join us in Alexandria here: https://t.co/0i99KG6uOT

Maryland: Join me @EvanMGlass and other local leaders this Sunday as we barnstorm with our friends in Virginia to get out the Super Tuesday vote for @ewarren! Join us for a 9am canvass launch in Alexandria & a 12pm canvass launch in Arlington. Hope to see you there! https://t.co/YBfDa8ASIz

It’s a complete honor to win the @bradybuzz endorsement as we work together to fight the tyrannical power of the NRA the GOP the firearms industry and all the Russian bots and provocateurs trying to thwart the will of the vast American majority.  Victory in 2020. @KrisB_Brown https://t.co/x4oH1Z8qBY

Sending love to Newmarket MD from Newmarket NH where they want Warren! Honored to fire up @NHforWarren crowds in Newmarket and Derry with a message of Democratic unity to overcome Banana Republicanism. Thx to @toniweinstein for launching us at her home. #FITN https://t.co/LcsEnJi7CB

Psyched to join #TeamWarren in NH this weekend and to meet all the great people up there I’ve been hearing from. From Maryland to New Hampshire we’re going all out to knock on doors and get votes for @ewarren. #FITN https://t.co/YuXSzf5cmv

Wonderful to see my little activist constituent Xiomara & her Mom @ElenaHung202 who is President & co-founder of @LittleLobbyists in this uplifting video. The whole family’s fighting to protect health care for all our people and so is @ewarren! We’re in this together. https://t.co/aeOjq6aS3Z

Exhilarating to speak to hundreds of Potomac polar plungers and climate defenders before they dived in for change with @CCAN. Forgot my bathing suit so had to go in like this. Anything to fight climate chaos. https://t.co/zhk7nBF5OG

Senator Elizabeth Warren has always stood with the American people and she has always stood with me. I am proud to stand with her now in her surging and historic campaign for President. Go @ewarren! https://t.co/8Mv3ITijmG
